entry.title: The Binding of Stiles
entry.summary:
Author: GrimReaperlover11

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,022Chapters: 9/9Kudos: 705

Summary: A witch decides to take revenge against Talia Hale by summoning a demon to harm her child, however the spell goes wrong and instead of having her child harmed by the demon...the demon is instead bound to the infant...leaving Talia in the rare situation of now having a demon babysitter for her son.Mieczyslaw hates witches. The fact that one was so incompetent to summon him to harm ad child and instead ripped his free will away from him, binding him to the infant, forcing him to do whatever he is commanded by his new charge...it's beyond infuriating. Now he must figure out how to break the spell while also playing Hell Nanny to the infant son of an alpha werewolf

entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,242Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 163

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”

entry.title: The Delta Pair and the Newly Awakened Universe
entry.summary:
Author: Mewwy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,624Chapters: 13/18Kudos: 13

Summary: When the world was introduced to the Supernatural, Sentinels and Guides over a hundred years ago, something remained hidden. Or should I say someone? It has taken two generations for the world tribe to come to terms that mundane human beings are not the only ones on the planet. There are the enhanced, Sentinels and Guides, and the Supernatural. But can there be more? Is there something more?There is a myth that has been foretold by those Guides on the spirit plane, but records offer only tantalizing fragments. Is this legendary prophecy real? And what role do Derek Sebastian Hale and Mieczysław Gajos “Mischief” “Stiles” Stilinski play into its unfolding? If the myth proves true, how far will their families go to shield them from its consequences?

entry.title: begin your journey and do not skip ahead
entry.summary:
Author: spoilerfreak

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 55,572Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 237

Summary: The first page greets him with a polaroid: Stiles, disheveled and grinning tiredly, perched on his suitcase in the living room. Beside it in marker block letters: BEGIN YOUR JOURNEY. DO NOT SKIP AHEAD. Derek scowls at the page, tempted to flip straight to the back. But in the corner in tiny letters: Yes, you can turn the page today. With a huff, he does. The next page has the present date and a short message: Here we are on the first day of me gone. I am on my way to get properly educated and you are on your way to find a treasure chest. Wipe that frown off your face, Sourwolf. We are both beginning an adventure, so put on something comfortable and pack a change of underwear. There’s an actual treasure map taped to the page. --- What if Stiles leaves for college and Derek decides to stay in Beacon Hills. What if Stiles leaves Derek with a journal entry for every day. An instruction manual. What if Derek follows it and rebuilds his life, page by page.

entry.title: Where Darkness meet the light
entry.summary:
Author: enoraishere

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,003Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Stiles and Scott go to SU (supernatural university) to learn about their abilities and mostly for Stiles to understand who he really is after the Nogistune.Well that didnt happen really well did it ?Stiles got kicked of McCall pack and now he sleeps in a simple dorm room with someone. 🥹During his stay he will re-met Derek Hale and the Hale family (yes let’s pretend the fire never happened. Yes Stiles was the one who helped them)What will happen of this relationship where Isaac and Liam are acting like cute puppies to Stiles? What will McCall say of this ? What is happening between Stiles and Derek ?Read to know(And do not mind my spelling mistakes please I beg. I don’t know if I should make Stile tall)

entry.title: Holiday Hell
entry.summary:
Author: ieatassforbreakfast009

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,358Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 36

Summary: All Stiles wanted was to give the Hale Pack a normal holiday season—tree decorating, sugar cookies, and zero supernatural explosions. Unfortunately, the wolves are competitive about everything, Derek is allergic to fun, and Stiles’ spark might actually explode from holiday stress. Still, if it means giving the pack a family again, Stiles is willing to drag them through holiday hell… one disaster at a time.

entry.title: Echoes of a Shattered Winter
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,740Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 19

Summary: Ice keeps no memories. But Stiles carries them all.The falls on the cold, unforgiving rink.The voices that whisper even in empty halls.The marks on his body and soul that refuse to fade. He learned early that perfection comes at a price.That silence can be crueler than screams.That every practiced move, every forced smile, is a shield against a world that never stopped judging. Derek Hale is everything he should avoid.Captain of the football team.Popular. Untouchable.A face that sparks rage, defiance, and, against his own will, a strange pull he cannot explain. In Beacon Hills, every glance weighs heavy.Every whisper lingers.And sometimes, it’s impossible to escape.From the past.From desire.From the shadows that live in your own skin.
